name: INRecurrenceRule
desc: An object that describes the pattern to use when repeating an event.

items.name: init(interval: Int, frequency: INRecurrenceFrequency)
items.desc: Initializes the recurrence rule to the specified frequency and interval.

items.name: var frequency: INRecurrenceFrequency
items.desc: The time frame for which the rule applies.

items.name: enum INRecurrenceFrequency
items.desc: The time frame for which the rule applies.

items.name: var interval: Int
items.desc: The interval at which the recurrence rule is applied.

items.name: init(interval: Int, frequency: INRecurrenceFrequency, weeklyRecurrenceDays: INDayOfWeekOptions)
